name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Mr. Domescreen
description:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally an entertainer in TV shows, it is still portraying its ever-changing roles after losing control and continues to bring surprises or scares to the audience.

skills.name: Surprise Variety Show
skills.description: Regenerates Energy for a target. This ability can only be used while under the Surprise Channel state.

skills.name: Startling Broadcast
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and causes all targets' Energy to be reduced. This ability can only be used while in the Fright Channel state.

skills.name: Channel Switch
skills.description: Switches the Surprise Channel status to the Fright Channel status.

skills.name: Channel Crossover
skills.description: After being attacked, this unit will switch from the Surprise Channel status to the Fright Channel status, or vice versa.
